name: webhooker-client
description: Simplify your webhook distribution infrastructure to a single line of code
author: Louis Capitanchik <louis@radweb.co.uk>

scripts.docs:bundle: jsdoc2md --files lib/*.js --files index.js --partial docs/overrides/partials/header.hbs --partial docs/overrides/partials/link.hbs --partial docs/overrides/partials/params-table.hbs > docs/api.md
scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:bundle && npm run docs:install && gitbook build
scripts.docs:serve: npm run docs:build && concurrently -k "npm run docs:watch"  "gitbook serve"
